channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large pothole in junction, 11th January
item.description:
This pothole is wide, deep and potentially dangerous and has continued to get bigger with further evidence of marginal deterioration
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Willett Way, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The house has so much rubbish in drive, 11th January
item.description:
Not sure if house has anyone there put so much rubbish been left in drive and it spill over onto path and in road as the wind moves it of the drive way
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Offenham Road, Elmstead, Greater London

item.title: Gas canisters and rubbish dumped on roundabout, 11th January
item.description:
I picked up a sackful of rubbish from the roundabout and will put it out for normal rubbish collection this week. Not sure of best way to deal with the gas canisters.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Forest Way, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Islamophobic graffiti on bus shelter, 11th January
item.description:
Obscene and islamophobic graffiti has been scrawled on the side of the bus shelter at stop H. There is a poster with a woman in a headscarf in the side of the shelter, and the graffiti is over the image. Very unpleasant.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sydenham Hill, Forest Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Polystyrene balls covering whole road, 11th January
item.description:
These balls are littering the whole street. They’ve been left behind by a highway works crew. It was previously reported on a nearby street and though it is reported as resolved, it has not been resolved. These styrofoam balls have been here for weeks.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Chevet Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive pothole, 11th January
item.description:
Bus stop had massive potholes which are getting worse every day. Causing a cable to be exposed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): West End Lane, West Hampstead, Greater London

item.title: Bollard to stop cars has been removed, 11th January
item.description:
Someone keeps removing the bollard so they can drive their car through on Bagshot Street outside Amigos restaurant. A neighbour was threatened when he tried to replace it. It needs a way to keep it securely in place so it can’t be removed again.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Bagshot Street, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned vehicle?, 11th January
item.description:
This car has not been moved in months and has been there so long it has green algae growing on it. We have been unable to find out who it belongs to. If it's not someone in the road we assume it must have been abandoned.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Coleridge Walk, Temple Fortune, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large dip in the road, 11th January
item.description:
Large dip in the road causing damage to cars and accidents as drivers trying to avoid it. The dip is highly uneven and affects traffic too.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Herne Hill Road, Loughborough Junction, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes, inadequate roads, 11th January
item.description:
These potholes are notorious and cover the whole stretch of road. The council need to resurface the whole of the road, not patchwork quilt it. This road has never had a smooth surface. Its dangerous and damages cars.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Honor Oak Park, Honor Oak, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
